org.actus.conventions.endofmonth

Class EndOfMonthAdjuster

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.actus.conventions.endofmonth.EndOfMonthAdjuster

  • public final class EndOfMonthAdjuster
extends Object
    Component for the adjustment of dates according to a EndOfMonthConvention

    • Constructor Detail

      • EndOfMonthAdjuster

        public EndOfMonthAdjuster(String convention,
                          LocalDateTime refDate,
                          Period period)
                   throws AttributeConversionException
        Constructor EndOfMonthConvention-adjustments are made when creating a schedule of ContractEvent-dates using the ScheduleFactory. Whether or not schedule dates are shifted to the end of month is determined by
        • The convention: "SD" = same day and means not adjusting, "EM" = end of month and means adjusting
        • The start date of the schedule: dates are only shifted if the schedule start date is an end-of-month date
        • the period of the schedule cycle: dates are only shifted if the schedule cycle is based on an "M" period unit or multiple thereof
        Parameters:
        convention - indicates the EndOfMonthConvention to be applied
        refDate - the schedule start date
        period - the period of the cycle used in the schedule
        Throws:
        AttributeConversionException - if convention does not conform with the ACTUS Data Dictionary

    • Method Detail

      • shift

        public LocalDateTime shift(LocalDateTime date)
        Shift a date to the end of the month according to a specific convention
        Parameters:
        date - the date to be shifted
        Returns:
        the shifted date
